Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "0-Text", "Knock down building pieces with \'Y\'.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "1-Text", "Hold \'ALT\' and drag off a stack to take single items")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "2-Text", "Hold \'SHIFT\' and drag to halve the stack into another slot")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "3-Text", "Your Utility slot is for carrying large items like animal carcasses and extractors.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "4-Text", "Drop your current item with \'Q\'.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "5-Text", "Quick-move items using CTRL + click.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "6-Text", "Switch to 3rd person with \'C\'.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "7-Text", "Move the camera in 3rd person by holding ALT.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "8-Text", "Workbenches and other items may be damaged by storms if not sheltered.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "9-Text", "Skinning benches deliver more resources from animal carcasses.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "10-Text", "Fill oxygen tanks with an oxite dissolver.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "11-Text", "Sickles increase the amount of fiber harvested")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "12-Text", "Gather rare herbs, then use the mortar and pestle to grind medicinal pastes")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "13-Text", "Drinking from a water source also refills water containers in your inventory")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "14-Text", "The United Development Agency was created to oversee terraforming on Icarus.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "15-Text", "Icarus\'s original designation was Wolf 1061ca.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "16-Text", "Open your crafting menu with \'O\'")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "17-Text", "Terraforming on Icarus collapsed due to the effects of exotic matter.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "18-Text", "Icarus is an Earth-sized moon of the gas giant Minos.")
NSLOCTEXT("D_Hints", "19-Text", "Open the tech tree with \'P\'.")
